<section>
    <nav>
        <button id="new" (click)="navigateToBookCreate()">
            + New Book
        </button>
        <button id="user" (click)="navigateToUserList()">
            User List
        </button>
        <button id="user" (click)="navigateToBorrowing()">
            Borrowing
        </button>
    </nav>  

    <app-book-read></app-book-read>
</section>
